newsitem.title: USA: Celebrity Entertainment oks reverse split.
newsitem.headline: Celebrity Entertainment oks reverse split.

text.p: Celebrity Entertainment Inc said the company will cause a reverse split of its outstanding common stock on the basis of one new share of common for every 50 shares of existing common stock.
As of November 19, 1996 there were 15,215,412 shares of common stock outstanding, it said.

The company believes the resulting shares will reflect a more stabilized price and will establish a simpler platform for reporting future net revenues, which are expected due to the company's new operations and pending acquisition.
